text: Vítor Manuel Melo Pereira (born April 21, 1957 in Lisbon) is a retired football (soccer) referee from Portugal, best known for supervising four matches at the FIFA World Cup: two in 1998 and 2002. Since August 2017 he is the Head of Greek refereeing appointed directly by FIFA. ==References== * Profile Category:1957 births Category:Portuguese football referees Category:FIFA World Cup referees Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Living people Category:UEFA Champions League referees Category:1998 FIFA World Cup referees Category:2002 FIFA World Cup referees Category:UEFA Euro 2000 referees
